metadata.name: 光 - Parted Light
metadata.description:
Some clouds have silver linings, and some - lit by the glow of the setting sun - have golden ones. 

As the winter sun falls behind the the towering skyscrapers of Central, Hong Kong, the light is parted by the buildings, scattering the rays into a beautiful display of light and shadow.

This image is a 1/1 edition as part of the '光 - Light' series, a collection of aerial photographs devoted to examining different kinds of light, whether natural or man-made, from the air.

This image was taken on 28th December 2020.
